NK085(ru)007:1349: des mtshon nas sku de la dpe' byed bzang po brgyad bcu yang mnga' ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1350: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1351: gtso bo dpe byad brgyad bcur ldan //
NK085(ru)007:1353: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1354: gzhan yang dpe byad brgyad bcu ste //
NK085(ru)007:1356: 'o na dpe byad brgyad bcu po de gang gang yin zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1357: dam pa dang po gsal byed dri myed 'od las /
NK085(ru)007:1358: 'dir dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:1359: 'phags pa mi pham 'gon gyi zhal nas kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1360: thub pa'i son mo zangs mdog dang //
NK085(ru)007:1361: mdog sbum mthong dang sor mo rnams //
NK085(ru)007:1362: bzlum rgyas byin gyis 'phra ba dang //
NK085(ru)007:1363: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa myed //
NK085(ru)007:1364: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:1365: stobs dang zhes pa ni stobs bcu mnga' ba ste /
NK085(ru)007:1366: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1367: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag /zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:1368: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1369: sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs phyogs dang //
NK085(ru)007:1371: 'o na stobs bcu po gang gang yin zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1372: dam pa dang po gsal byed dri myed 'od las /
NK085(ru)007:1373: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1374: las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1375: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1376: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1377: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1378: sdug bsngal 'gog par grol ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1379: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1380: 'chi 'phel dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1381: mngon par shes pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1382: zag pa zad pa'i stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1383: zhes gsungs pa de rnams yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1384: mi 'jigs zhes pa ni sangs rgyas de 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1385: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1388: mi 'jigs pa rang du mnga' zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1390: dam pa dang po gsal byed dri med 'od las /
NK085(ru)007:1391: sangs rgyas mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)007:1392: chos thams cad kun nas kye ba myed pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1393: chos thams cad bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1394: sgrib pa myed pa'i lam 'jug pa ma mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1395: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa la mi 'jigs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1397: phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun te /
NK085(ru)007:1398: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)007:1399: yang dag par yong ba bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)007:1400: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)007:1403: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
NK085(ru)007:1404: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
NK085(ru)007:1405: de ltar yang dam pa dang po'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)007:1406: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa dang //
NK085(ru)007:1407: de bzhin gzhan yang dran pa ni //
NK085(ru)007:1408: nye bar bzhag dang yang dag yong //
NK085(ru)007:1409: stobs lnga dang ni dbang po rnams //
NK085(ru)007:1410: byang chub yan lag mchod pa bdun //
NK085(ru)007:1411: 'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad //
NK085(ru)007:1413: zag pa zhes pa dang mchod pa zhes pa ni tshigs bcad kyi ngor brjod kyi /
NK085(ru)007:1414: skabs su bab pa'i chos ni ma yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1415: de rnams kyi gsal ba'i dbye ba yang dam pa
NK085(ru)007:1416: dang po'i gsal byed dri myed 'od las gsungs te
NK085(ru)007:1418: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)007:1419: lus dran gnye bar bzhag pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1420: tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1421: sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1422: chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1423: yang dag par yong ba bzhi ni //
NK085(ru)007:1424: srid pa'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed ba'i bdun pa bskyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1425: sdig pa'i chos skyes pa rnams kyi gnyen po dge' ba bskyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1426: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1427: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid du bsngo ba ste bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)007:1428: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)007:1437: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1445: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni /
NK085(ru)007:1446: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1447: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1448: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1449: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1450: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1451: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)007:1452: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
NK085(ru)007:1453: 'phags ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
NK085(ru)007:1454: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1455: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1457: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
NK085(ru)007:1459: yang dag pa'i brtsol ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1460: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1461: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
NK085(ru)007:1463: pha rol du phyin pa zhes pa ni pha rol du phyin pa bcu ste /
NK085(ru)007:1464: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1465: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
NK085(ru)007:1466: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
NK085(ru)007:1467: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
NK085(ru)007:1468: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
NK085(ru)007:1470: 'o na pha rol du phyin pa bcu po rang gang gang yin na /
NK085(ru)007:1471: dam pa dang po gsal byed dri myed 'od las gsungs te /
NK085(ru)007:1473: pha rol du phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)007:1483: ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1485: sngags kyi don la rnam par gzigs pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1486: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus /
NK085(ru)007:1487: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab thabs //
NK085(ru)007:1488: smon lam stobs dang ye shes te //
NK085(ru)007:1491: sa dang zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK085(ru)007:1492: sangs rgyas kyi sa la ldog pa'i bye brag gis
NK085(ru)007:1493: sa rnam pa bcu gnyis su gnas pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1494: de yang sa rnams kyi ming ni kun tu 'od kyi sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1502: dpe' dang ldan pa'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1505: so sor rang rig pa'i sa rnams so //
NK085(ru)007:1506: de la dang po kun tu 'od kyi sa ni
NK085(ru)007:1507: dam pa dang po gsal byed dri myed 'od las
NK085(ru)007:1508: / kun tu 'od 'jam pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1510: rdo rje snying po brgyan gyi rgyud las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1511: kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po //
NK085(ru)007:1514: de lta na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1516: sgrib byed kyi mun pa thams cad yangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1517: gshar gsher gyi rlan rdzab thams cad skams pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1518: sman dang lo thog thams cad smyin pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1519: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na ma rig pa'i mun pa sangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1520: rnam rtog gi rlan rdzab skam pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1521: gdul bya mtha' dag smon mi grol bar byed pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1522: gnyis pa bdud rtsi 'od kyi sa ni /
NK085(ru)007:1525: bdud rtsi 'od zla ba chen po bsil ba'i sa dang zhes gsungs la /
NK085(ru)007:1527: bdud rtsi 'od ni gnyis pa ste //
NK085(ru)007:1530: dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar tsam na chos gsum ldan yin te /
NK085(ru)007:1531: tshad pa'i gdung ba zhi ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1532: chu bo mang po 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1533: dngos po thams cad gsal ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1534: de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1535: nyon mongs kyi tshad gdung zhi ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1536: ye shes kyi rtogs pa 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1537: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1538: gsum pa nam mkha' 'od kyi sa ni /
NK085(ru)007:1540: nam mkha' 'od ni nam mkha' bzhin du rab tu gnas pa'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1543: nam mkha' 'od ni gsum pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1544: nam mkha'i bzhin bzhin so sor gnas //
NK085(ru)007:1546: dper na nam mkha' ni chos gsum de yin te /
NK085(ru)007:1547: thams cad la khyab pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1548: rnam rtog mi mnga' ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1550: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa ma gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1551: chos skus thams cad la khyab cing /
NK085(ru)007:1553: rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1554: bzhi pa rdo rje 'od kyi sa ni dam pa dang po las /
NK085(ru)007:1555: rdo rjes 'od yid du 'ong ba'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1558: rdo rje 'od ni bzhi pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1559: sa de nyid ni yid dga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1560: bsam pa nang gi brtan sbyor ba /
NK085(ru)007:1561: rdo rje zhes ni yongs su brtags zhes gsungs te /
NK085(ru)007:1562: dper na rdo rje pha lam ni dngos po gang gis bshig pa 'am dbye bar mi nus so //
NK085(ru)007:1563: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1564: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis myed du gyur pas /
NK085(ru)007:1565: bzung bzhin gyi rnam rtog gis bshig pa 'am dbye bar mi nus pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1566: lnga pa rin chen 'od kyi sa ni dam dang 'od /
NK085(ru)007:1567: rin chen 'od dbang rab tu gnas pa'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1570: lnga ba rin chen 'od ces pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1571: dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
NK085(ru)007:1573: sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1574: rin chen gcod pan gyis khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pas /
NK085(ru)007:1575: gzugs sku gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1576: drug pa pad ma'i 'od kyi sa ni dam dang pas /
NK085(ru)007:1577: pad ma 'od rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos dri ma myed pa 'dzin pa'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1580: pad ma 'od ni drug pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1582: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid phyir //
NK085(ru)007:1583: dri ma myed pa yongs su gsungs //
NK085(ru)007:1585: dper na pad ma 'dam na gnas kyang 'dam gyi dri mas ma gos pa bzhin du /
NK085(ru)007:1586: gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi don byed kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1587: sems can gyi nyon mongs kyis mi gos pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1588: bdun pa las kyi 'od ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1589: las kyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi las byed pa'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1592: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces pa /
NK085(ru)007:1593: sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed par 'dod ces pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1594: sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas nas gzugs skus 'gro don mdzad pa de yang /
NK085(ru)007:1595: 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1596: brgyad pa dpe myed pa'i sa ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1597: dpe myed pa'i sa dang zhes gsungs la /
NK085(ru)007:1599: rgyad pa dpe' myed bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)007:1600: de la dpe' ni yod ma yin //
NK085(ru)007:1602: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de don dam par ram stong nyid phros bral yin la /
NK085(ru)007:1603: de la phyogs thams cad nas 'dra ba'i dpe myed pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1604: dgu pa dpe dang ldan pa sa ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1605: dpe dang de thams cad la sogs pa'i sa dang zhes gsungs la /
NK085(ru)007:1607: dpe' dang ldan pa dgu pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1608: thams cad dpe ni so sor 'bigs //
NK085(ru)007:1610: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de kun rdzob tsam du nam
NK085(ru)007:1611: mkha' dang nor bu la sogs pa dpes mtshon nas
NK085(ru)007:1612: go bar nus pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1613: bcu pa shes pa 'od kyi sa ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1614: shes rab 'od bla na myed pa'i sa dang zhes gsungs la /
NK085(ru)007:1616: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa /
NK085(ru)007:1617: sangs rgyas pa ni bla na myed //
NK085(ru)007:1619: sangs rgyas ni chos sku yin la /
NK085(ru)007:1620: chos sku ni stong nyid yin pas de'i gong na gzhan byed pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1621: bcu gcig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1622: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chen po 'di gsal ba'i sa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1625: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
NK085(ru)007:1626: sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba //
NK085(ru)007:1628: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1629: ye shes kyi 'od chen pos shes bya ji lta
NK085(ru)007:1630: ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad gsal zhing mkhyen
NK085(ru)007:1632: bcu gnyis pa so so rang rig pa'i sa ni dam dang las /
NK085(ru)007:1633: rnal 'byor pas so sor rang rig pa'i ye shes rdzogs pa'i sa'o zhes gsungs la /
NK085(ru)007:1635: bcu gnyis so sor rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu rdzogs //
NK085(ru)007:1637: sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas tsam na /
NK085(ru)007:1638: gnyis snang thams cad dag nas /
NK085(ru)007:1639: gnyis myed kyi ye shes mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1640: dbang bskur zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i dus kyi dbang bskur te /
NK085(ru)007:1641: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi mthar phyogs bcu'i
NK085(ru)007:1642: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos kyi rgyal por dbang bkur
NK085(ru)007:1644: de yang pha rol du phyin pa'i gzhung ltar na yang /
NK085(ru)007:1645: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa na yar la
NK085(ru)007:1646: sa bcu bgrod pa'i mthar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis
NK085(ru)007:1647: dbang bkur bas sangs rgya bar bshad de /
NK085(ru)007:1648: 'o skol gyi bcom ldan 'das shag thub 'di yang
NK085(ru)007:1649: sa bcu bsgrod pa'i mthar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis
NK085(ru)007:1650: dbang bkur bas sangs rgyas ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1651: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1652: sngon rdza mkhan gyi bu snang byed zhes bya ba
NK085(ru)007:1653: des dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas
NK085(ru)007:1654: / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas /
NK085(ru)007:1655: mthar byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa
NK085(ru)007:1656: zhes bya ba sa bcu'i dbang phyug chen por gyur
NK085(ru)007:1657: / de nas gnas khyad par can 'og min gyi
NK085(ru)007:1658: gnas khyad par can thug po bkod pa'i zhing khams
NK085(ru)007:1659: / / pho brang khyad can chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang /
NK085(ru)007:1660: rgyu khyad par can tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa /
NK085(ru)007:1661: chos kyi me long chen po'i mdzod der byon nas /
NK085(ru)007:1662: seng ge'i khri pad ma'i sdong po la bzhugs te /
NK085(ru)007:1663: sngar gyi gdam ngag la rten nas bsgom pa la /
NK085(ru)007:1664: sems ma chun nas sangs rgya bar ma nus so //
NK085(ru)007:1665: de'i phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas der 'dus nas /
NK085(ru)007:1666: khong gi dbu la cod pan bzhag ste chos kyi rgyal por dbang bkur nas gdam ngag bstan to //
NK085(ru)007:1667: de ltar yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
NK085(ru)007:1668: shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin //
NK085(ru)007:1669: gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur la //
NK085(ru)007:1670: 'og min mthug po nyams dga' bar //
NK085(ru)007:1671: blo gros chen po bzhugs par 'tshal //
NK085(ru)007:1673: de'i rjes ma byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad
NK085(ru)007:1674: grub pa des dbang gi don nyams su myong zhing
NK085(ru)007:1675: gdam ngag gi don bsgoms pas /
NK085(ru)007:1676: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so //
NK085(ru)007:1677: de nas chos kyi sku de'i byin brlabs dang /
NK085(ru)007:1678: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu las /
NK085(ru)007:1679: dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhes bya ba 'am /
NK085(ru)007:1680: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs skur shar te /
NK085(ru)007:1682: de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pas chos skur sangs rgyas nas /
NK085(ru)007:1683: gzugs sku 'gro don du byon pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1684: yang gzhung kha cig las dbang phyug zhes 'byung ste /
NK085(ru)007:1685: de ltar yang dbang phyug brgyad mnga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1686: de la dbang phyug rnam pa brgyad ni //
NK085(ru)007:1688: gsung gi dbang phyug dang ni /
NK085(ru)007:1691: kun tu 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang /
NK085(ru)007:1693: ci 'dod bskyed pa'i dbang phyug dang /
NK085(ru)007:1694: yon tan gyi dbang phyug go //
NK085(ru)007:1695: de la sku'i dbang phyug ni sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1696: dbu 'i gtsug gtor mi mthong ba la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1697: gsung gi dbang phyug ni gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1698: gsung gi mtha' mi mngon pa la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1699: thugs kyi dbang phyug ni thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1700: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang las sems can gyi don 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1701: rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug ni stod nas me 'bar zhing /
NK085(ru)007:1702: dmad nas chu 'brug pa la sogs pa /
NK085(ru)007:1703: sems can 'dun par byed pa la sogs pa rdzu
NK085(ru)007:1704: 'phrul ya ma zung sna tshogs ston pa nus pa'o
NK085(ru)007:1705: // kun 'gro'i dbang phyug ni nam mkhas gar khyab tu dbyings dang ye shes kyis khyab la /
NK085(ru)007:1706: des gar khyab tu thugs rjes khyab pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1707: gnas kyi dbang phyug ni gdul bya gang na bzhugs
NK085(ru)007:1708: pa'i gnas su 'dul byed kyi skus khyab par mdzad
NK085(ru)007:1709: nus pa'o // ci 'dod bskyod pa'i dbang phyug ni
NK085(ru)007:1710: gdul bya ci dang ci 'dod pa'i bsam pa can
NK085(ru)007:1711: nus pa'o // la / dngos po de dang de bskyed nus pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1712: yon tan gyi dbang phyug ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'i dbang phyug mnga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1713: de ltar na dbang phyug rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1714: sgron ma gsal ba las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1715: sku'i dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang /
NK085(ru)007:1716: rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK085(ru)007:1717: ci 'dod bskyed dang yon tan brgyad pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1719: rdzogs zhes pa ni de dag las kha cig ni nyams su blangs pa'i tshul gyis rdzogs la /
NK085(ru)007:1720: kha cig ni mngon du bya ba'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1721: de la byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi dang /
NK085(ru)007:1722: pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)007:1723: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)007:1724: dbang bskur ni nyams su blangs pa'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1725: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)007:1727: dbang phyug rnams ni mngon du byas pa'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1728: 'o na longs sku de gnas gang na bzhugs na /
NK085(ru)007:1729: dag pa'i zhing du zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1730: smon pa'i zhal nas bde' ba can la sogs pa yin tsam las mi gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)007:1731: 'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa cig na mar
NK085(ru)007:1732: la longs sku'i zhing khams rnam pa lngar gsungs te
NK085(ru)007:1733: / de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rigs rnam pa lnga las /
NK085(ru)007:1734: sangs rgyas rnam par bzhugs pa'i zhing khams ni dbus
NK085(ru)007:1735: mthug po bkod pa'i zhing khams zhes bya ba yin
NK085(ru)007:1736: / sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa'i zhing khams
NK085(ru)007:1737: ni shar mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten zhes bya
NK085(ru)007:1738: / ba yin / sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan bzhugs pa'i zhing khams ni /
NK085(ru)007:1739: lho rin chen yod pa'i 'jig rten bya ba yin /
NK085(ru)007:1740: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs pa'i zhing khams
NK085(ru)007:1741: ni nub bde' ba can gyi 'jig rten zhes bya
NK085(ru)007:1742: ba yin / sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs
NK085(ru)007:1743: pa'i zhing khams ni nub bde' ba can gyi zhing
NK085(ru)007:1745: sangs rgyas don yod grub pa bzhugs pa'i zhing khams ni /
NK085(ru)007:1746: byang 'brug sgrog pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba yin zhes so //
NK085(ru)007:1747: de 'o na de rnams la dag zhing zhes ji ltar bzhag zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1750: de la phyi snod dag pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams de dag sa rdo las grub pa'am /
NK085(ru)007:1751: ngam 'brog dang g.yang sa can la sogs pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)007:1752: sa gzhi thams cad rin po che las grub pa /
NK085(ru)007:1753: mnan na nems kyis byed pa /
NK085(ru)007:1754: bteg na par gyis byed pa /
NK085(ru)007:1755: rad na'i ljon shing skyes pa /
NK085(ru)007:1757: rad na'i 'od zer 'phro ba yod pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1758: nang bcud dag pa ni de dag dmyal ba la sogs pa mi gnas /
NK085(ru)007:1759: mu rtegs dang nyan thos la sogs pa theg pa dman pa'i rigs can mi gnas te /
NK085(ru)007:1760: thams cad kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs can mi gnas te /
NK085(ru)007:1761: thams cad kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs can lha
NK085(ru)007:1762: mi'i lus phun sum tshogs pa zhe stag yin zhes
NK085(ru)007:1763: gsungs pa'o // longs sku de dus ci tsam du bzhugs na rtag par zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1765: mdzad pa'i khyad par ci mdzad zhe na /
NK085(ru)007:1766: tshogs chen bkor zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1767: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1768: de'i 'khor ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)007:1769: sprul pa'i sku ni tshig rkang brgyad kyis ston pa la /
NK085(ru)007:1770: 'dul ba'i don du zhes pa ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i don du ste dgos ched do //
NK085(ru)007:1771: de yang gdul bya ni dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis char te /
NK085(ru)007:1772: don la rigs can gsum ka'o //
NK085(ru)007:1773: snang ba 'gag pa myed zhes pa ni gdul bya gang na yod pa'i rgyud la /
NK085(ru)007:1774: 'dul byed sprul pa'i sku gang dang gang gis 'dul
NK085(ru)007:1775: ba de dang de'i skur snang ba mi 'gag pa'o
NK085(ru)007:1776: // de ni dpe dang ba'i chu zla bzhin zhes par 'brel te /
NK085(ru)007:1777: chu dang ba gang na yod par zla ba'i bsgrib
NK085(ru)007:1778: byed dang bral ba'i gzugs brnyan 'char ba mi 'gag
NK085(ru)007:1779: pa ltar ro // legs pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan zhes pa ni ji skad du /
NK085(ru)007:1780: thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang //
NK085(ru)007:1781: gsal la rdzogs pa 'phags pa yin //
NK085(ru)007:1783: sprul pa'i sku de sku la mtshan bzang po sum
NK085(ru)007:1784: bcu rtsa gnyis kyis rang rang gi yul yul rnams
NK085(ru)007:1785: su gsal la rdzogs shing mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1786: gang yang gnas zhes pa ni sprul sku de yang gnas gcig du nges pa myed pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1787: gdul bya dang bsdun zhing gnas pa'i don to //
NK085(ru)007:1788: dus las yol myed zhes pa ni gdul bya 'dul
NK085(ru)007:1789: ba'i dus ma bab na sprul sku mi yol ba
NK085(ru)007:1791: rgya mtsho chu srin gnas rnams ni /
NK085(ru)007:1792: rlabs ni dus mas yol ba srid //
NK085(ru)007:1793: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
NK085(ru)007:1794: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba myed //
NK085(ru)007:1796: de'i dpe yang dang ba'i chu zla bzhin no //
NK085(ru)007:1797: 'bad brtsol myed zhes pa ni gdul bya sems can
NK085(ru)007:1798: thams cad dngos sam rgyud pas phan pa dang bde'
NK085(ru)007:1800: 'bad pa dang brtsol bas mdzad pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)007:1801: ngang ngam rang shugs kyis lhun grub tu 'byung ba'i don to //
NK085(ru)007:1802: rtog myed zhes pa ni sems can gyi don mdzad
NK085(ru)007:1803: pa de yang don bya'o snyam pa'i rnam rtog mi
NK085(ru)007:1805: de ltar 'bad brtsol byed par sems can gyi don 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1806: rnam rtog myed par sems can gyi don 'byung ba
NK085(ru)007:1807: gnyis char gyi dper yid bzhin nor bu ltar zhes
NK085(ru)007:1808: smos so // de lta bu'i 'bras bu de dag
NK085(ru)007:1809: thams cad ci'i sgo nas 'byung ba yin zhe na
NK085(ru)007:1810: smos so // / rgyu myed las 'byung ba lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)007:1811: smon lam grub pas zhes pa dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa 'byung ba'i don te /
NK085(ru)007:1812: thugs rje 'gag pa min zhes pa ni mi dmyigs
NK085(ru)007:1813: pa'i snying rje chen po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don
NK085(ru)007:1814: to // longs spyod chen po zhes pa ni theg
NK085(ru)007:1815: pa sna tshogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bkor ba'o
NK085(ru)007:1816: to // // mnyam pa nyid la gnas zhes pa
NK085(ru)007:1817: ni theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs kyang don la
NK085(ru)007:1818: to // // / theg pa gcig yin pa'i don to //
NK085(ru)007:1819: dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po las /
NK085(ru)007:1820: theg pa cig cing tshul yang cig /gtso bos bstan
NK085(ru)007:1821: pa yang cig /gang yang theg pa gsum bstan pa
NK085(ru)007:1822: / nga'i thabs la mkhas pa'i dngos //
NK085(ru)007:1824: lta mo dpal 'phreng seng ge nga ro'i mdo' las kyang /
NK085(ru)007:1825: theg pa ni cig kho na ste /
NK085(ru)007:1826: gnyis dang gsum bsogs ma mchis so //
NK085(ru)007:1828: 'dod pa'i yon tan grub pa ni sems bskyed tsa na'i 'dod pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1829: sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1830: 'gag pa myed pa ni gdul bya pa ros 'jog tu snang yang /
NK085(ru)007:1831: sprul sku'i mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1833: la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
NK085(ru)007:1834: la lar me bzhin mya ngan 'das //
NK085(ru)007:1835: la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston //
NK085(ru)007:1836: nam yang myed pa ma yin te //
NK085(ru)007:1838: bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum gnas zhes bshad
NK085(ru)007:1839: pa ni de lta bu'i sangs rgyas de yang sdom
NK085(ru)007:1840: pa dang dam tshig bsrungs pas thob pa'i don to
NK085(ru)007:1841: // mchog gi 'bras bu shin tu rgyas par bshad pa /
NK085(ru)007:1842: rdzogs s+ao ////bsgrub ldan pa yod do //
NK085(ru)007:1843: pa po rnams bza' btung la chags par byed pa dang zhes pa'i thad kar 'di skad gsung ste /
NK085(ru)007:1844: sha la jo bo bsgom chen dgyes /
NK085(ru)007:1845: dud 'gro'i blo phugs su ma gtod /
NK085(ru)007:1846: jo bo dag sems can mang por bsgom zhing /
NK085(ru)007:1847: pha ma'i sha za ba 'di phod lags sam /
NK085(ru)007:1848: 'o na gzhan sha za chos so //
NK085(ru)007:1849: chang dang jo bo bsgom chen che /
NK085(ru)007:1850: bcas pa'i bsla ba pa su yis bsrung /
NK085(ru)007:1851: jo bo dag chang ni nyes pa bskyed pa'i gzhi can yin pas /
NK085(ru)007:1852: rtsa mchog gis kyang mi btung bar sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1853: sangs rgyas kyi bka' gcog pa 'di phod lags sam /
NK085(ru)007:1855: ja la jo bo bsgom chen yengs /
NK085(ru)007:1857: jo bo ba dag lam bde lta bu dag brnyed par dka' tshod dam /
NK085(ru)007:1858: dus da lta bsgrubs na phan yon che tshod dam /
NK085(ru)007:1859: rtsod dus kyi gang zag tsho'i thung tshod dam /
NK085(ru)007:1860: chos la bar chad mang tshod la /
NK085(ru)007:1861: ja'i ro la chags shing yengs nas /
NK085(ru)007:1862: le lo byed pa cang khom lags sam /
NK085(ru)007:1863: 'o na gzhan ja la rgyag ches /
NK085(ru)007:1864: iti ////bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)007:1865: dbang dang 'brel pa'i dam tshig ni slob dpon gyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1866: 'di dag la dge bshes zhang gi bzhed pa ltar na /
NK085(ru)007:1867: pham pa rnam pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)007:1869: gong ma na smad pa'i 'pham pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1870: dngos gzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'pham pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1873: ltung ba ni bzhi pa 'og ma 'grel ba'i ltung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1874: dngos gzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i ltung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1875: gong ma na smad pa'i ltung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1876: phyogs su bsdu ba'i ltung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1881: sbyor ba rdzogs pa'i lci ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1883: sbom po'i lci ba la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)007:1885: gong ma na smad pa'i lci ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1888: gong ma na smad pa'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1889: yan lag gtso bo'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1890: nyon mongs pa 'bring gis bslang ba'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1891: yul 'bring la rten nas kyes pa'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1892: yan lag ma tshang ba'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1893: yan lag gi sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1895: de dag gi bshad pa dang rtag dpyod ni gzhan nas 'byung ba ltar shes pa bya'o //
NK085(ru)007:1896: slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pa'i 'gyur snga ma gzhung
NK085(ru)007:1897: 'di rang gi dbang du byas na ni gnyis te
NK085(ru)007:1898: / tshad las 'das pa'i pham pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1899: phyogs su bsdu ba'i pham ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1900: de la dang po ni sbyor ba bdun dang ldan
NK085(ru)007:1901: par rdo rje slob dpon 'tsho ba dang phral na
NK085(ru)007:1902: / ma bshags par lo gnyis 'das pa na pham par gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1903: de ltar yang ltung ba dang po las /
NK085(ru)007:1904: gal te sbyor pa de dag dang ldan pas 'tsho
NK085(ru)007:1905: ba dang bral nas tshad las 'das pa dang pham
NK085(ru)007:1907: tshad las 'das zhes pa ni lo gsum 'das pa yin par 'og nas gsal lo //
NK085(ru)007:1908: gzhan dag ni de la bshags pa dus las 'das
NK085(ru)007:1909: pa'i pham pa bya bar mi 'dogs zer te de
NK085(ru)007:1910: legs so // phyogs su bsdu ba'i pham pa ni gnyis te /
NK085(ru)007:1911: ltung ba gsum pa'i dbang du byas pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1912: ltung ba bzhi pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1913: dang po sbyor ba bdun dang ldan pas rdo rje
NK085(ru)007:1914: slob dpon 'tsho ba dang bral nas ma bshags pa
NK085(ru)007:1916: de ltar yang ltung ba gsum pa las /
NK085(ru)007:1917: 'di'i phyogs dang mthun pa no zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1920: ltung ba bzhi pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK085(ru)007:1921: yul sems can gzhan la rang gis sbyor ba dngos gzhi skyes nas /
NK085(ru)007:1922: ma bshags par dus 'das te shi ba dang pham pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1923: yang rang la gzhan gyis bshags pa tshul bzhin du byed pa la /
NK085(ru)007:1924: rang gis ma blangs par rang shi bar gyur na pham pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1925: de ltar yang ltung ba bzhi pa las /
NK085(ru)007:1926: gzhan la sbyor ba dngos gzhi skyes pa ma brtags par zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:1927: ltung ba gzhan rnams la dge bshes zhang gi dngos gzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i pham pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1928: phyogs su bsdu ba'i pham pa ma rtogs pa pham pa gzhan gsum ni yong bar 'dod do //
NK085(ru)007:1929: gzhung las pham pa yong bar bshad pa gsal ba myed do //
NK085(ru)007:1931: sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i ltung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1932: gong ma na smad pa'i ltung ba dang /
NK085(ru)007:1933: phyogs su bsdu ba'i ltung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1934: de la dang po ni ltung ba dang po'i dbang
NK085(ru)007:1935: du byas nas sbyor ba bdun gyi sgo nas 'tsho
NK085(ru)007:1937: de ltar yang gsum gcig la ldan pa la bdun
NK085(ru)007:1938: gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas ltung bar 'gyur te
NK085(ru)007:1941: zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis gsal lo //
NK085(ru)007:1942: ltung ba gnyis pa la sogs pa sbyor ba rdzogs
NK085(ru)007:1943: pa'i ltung ba yang sbyor ba bdun dang ldan pa'o
NK085(ru)007:1944: // gong ma na smad pa'i ltung ba ni pham
NK085(ru)007:1945: pa bshags tshad kyis bshags pa'i shul nas ltung ba
NK085(ru)007:1948: phyis tshad du bshags na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:1949: ltung ba ni 'tsho ba dang bral nas bshags pa'i tshad 'og nas 'byung ba byas pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1951: 'di ni ltung ba dang po la 'byung gi gzhan la dpyad par bya'o //
NK085(ru)007:1952: phyogs su bsdu ba'i ltung ba ni sbyor ba bdun
NK085(ru)007:1953: dang ldan pas tha mal pa'i mi bsad pa ste
NK085(ru)007:1955: mi ni ltung ba'i phyogs su bsdu zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:1956: lci ba dang zhes pa ni phal cher sbom pa
NK085(ru)007:1957: ma bshags par lo gsum 'das pa la lci ba
NK085(ru)007:1958: zhes gsungs so // sbom po zhes pa ni gong
NK085(ru)007:1959: du smos pa'i brgyad pa de'o dang po gnyis dar
NK085(ru)007:1960: po'i phyi ma drug po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1961: de'i steng du sbyor ba ma rdzogs pa'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1962: yul ma dag pa la bsam pa dag pas bslang nas skyes pa'i sbom po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1963: yul ma dag pa la bsam pa dag bas kun
NK085(ru)007:1964: nas bslang nas kyes pa'i sbom po zhes bya ba
NK085(ru)007:1966: de la sbyor ba ma rdzogs pa'i sbom po ni
NK085(ru)007:1967: 'ga' zhig gis sbyor ba bdun gyi sgo nas rdo
NK085(ru)007:1968: rje slob dpon nam rdo rje yun 'tsho ba dbral
NK085(ru)007:1970: de 'tsho ba dang bral par ma gyur na don
NK085(ru)007:1971: de ma grub pas sbyor pa ma rdzogs pa yin
NK085(ru)007:1973: 'di ni ltung ba dang po dang gsum pa la 'byung ba yin no //
NK085(ru)007:1975: ltung ba dang po dang po las /
NK085(ru)007:1976: 'tsho ba dang ma bral na ltung bar ma 'gyur te sbom po'o zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:1977: yan lag gi gtso bo'i sbom po ni nyon mongs
NK085(ru)007:1978: pas kun nas bslang ba'i bsam pa tsam zhig skyes
NK085(ru)007:1979: pa ste / 'di ni ltung ba gnyis pa'i thad
NK085(ru)007:1980: kar ji skad du yan lag gi gtso bo ni
NK085(ru)007:1982: 'byung ba ni ltung ba bcu bzhi po dang /
NK085(ru)007:1983: bac+wo lnga po kun la 'byung gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)007:1984: nyon mongs pa 'bring gis bslang ba'i sbom po ni mnar sems dgu dang mi ldan par /
NK085(ru)007:1985: yul sems can la zhe sdang glo bur du tol gyis kyes pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1986: 'di ni ltung ba bzhi pa 'ang 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1988: sems khong nas 'khrug pa ni sbom po'o //
NK085(ru)007:1990: yul 'bring la rten nas skyes pa'i sbom po ni
NK085(ru)007:1991: theg pa chen po'i mdo' sde la nyon mongs kyis
NK085(ru)007:1992: kun nas bslang nas smad pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1993: 'di ni ltung ba drug pa las 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:1995: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sbom po'o //
NK085(ru)007:1997: yul ma dag pa la bsam pa dag pas kun nas bslang nas skyes pa'i sbom po ni /
NK085(ru)007:1998: ma sbyin pa'i sems can la snying rje'i bsam pas gsang pa'i chos bstan pa ste /
NK085(ru)007:1999: 'di ni ltung ba bdun pa las 'byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)007:2001: snying rjes bzhugs na sbom po'o //
NK085(ru)007:2003: yan lag ma tshang ba'i sbom po ni /
NK085(ru)007:2004: yan lag gzhan 'tshogs pa la rjes kyi yan lag gang yang rung ba ma tshang ba ste /
NK085(ru)007:2005: 'di ni ltung ba bcu bzhi po dang bac+wo lnga po kun la 'byung ngo //
NK085(ru)007:2006: yan lag sbom po ni 'og gi brgyad dang bcu gsum pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:2007: sbom po'i sbom po ni sbom po ni yan lag
NK085(ru)007:2008: dag kun nas slong ba'i bsam pa de skyes pa
NK085(ru)007:2010: yan lag gi nyes pa'i skabs nas /
NK085(ru)007:2011: yan lag gi sbom po tsam yod pa ni sbom po'o zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)007:2012: yan lag dang zhes pa ni brgyad po dang bcu gsum pa'o //
NK085(ru)007:2013: nyes byas dang zhes pa ni ltung ba dang po'i
NK085(ru)007:2014: ltar na nyon mongs pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa
NK085(ru)007:2015: myed na long rdo rje skyur pas bla ma la
NK085(ru)007:2016: phog nas drongs pa lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)007:2018: yan lag drug dang mi ldan par dngos gzhi rdzogs na nyes byas so //
NK085(ru)007:2020: ltung ba gzhan rnams kyi nyes byas ni thad ka thad kar go bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)007:2021: 'phra mo dang zhes pa ni ltung ba dang po'i
NK085(ru)007:2022: dbang du byas nas 'gong bar bya ba ma yin
NK085(ru)007:2024: ltung ba gzhan rnams kyi phra mo thad ka thad kar go par bya'o //
NK085(ru)007:2025: nyes pa myed pa dang zhes pa ni nyes pa
NK085(ru)007:2026: byas kyang nyes par ma gyur par ltung ba'i gzugs
NK085(ru)007:2027: brnyan de / skye ba myed par rtogs pa la sogs pa'i dus su'o //
NK085(ru)007:2031: lha dang drang srong bden pa'i ngag /gang la sbyar ba'i nus pa yang //
NK085(ru)007:2032: bslu bar byed pa ma mthong na //
NK085(ru)007:2034: rgyal po skyabs seng gi lo rgyus ni /
NK085(ru)007:2035: sngon shag kya'i la rtsi byi zhes pa'i sras ched po dmag brgya' pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:2037: dmag brgya' pa la bu dgu bcu go dgu pha dang brgya' yod de /
NK085(ru)007:2038: skyabs seng la tsun mo mchog lnga brgya' khab tu bzhes pa la bu myed do //
NK085(ru)007:2039: de cis lan na rgyal po 'di 'phong la mkhas pa'i mthar mthug pas /
NK085(ru)007:2040: nags na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ri dgas mo la snyoms par zhugs pas /
NK085(ru)007:2041: de'i sgra rgyal pos thos pa tsam la thug pa'i
NK085(ru)007:2042: khros ste mda' 'phangs pas ri dgas mo dang drang
NK085(ru)007:2044: der drang srong gis smod bor bas ma ning du
NK085(ru)007:2045: gyur te nad dang bcas pas bud myed chog la
NK085(ru)007:2046: brten kyang bde ba myi skye zhing bu bskyed pa'i
NK085(ru)007:2047: nus pa med pas bu med do //
NK085(ru)007:2048: der pho bo dmag brgya' pa dgrar langs pas rgyal
NK085(ru)007:2049: po skyabs seng gis yang drang srong la bu bslangs
NK085(ru)007:2050: pas / drang srong gis bu lnga byin to //
NK085(ru)007:2051: nyi ma'i bu bse' khrab can dang /
NK085(ru)007:2052: drag po'i bu mthar byed dang /
NK085(ru)007:2053: lta'i bu las sna tshogs dang /
NK085(ru)007:2054: rlung lha'i bu mi 'jigs bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:2055: khyab 'jug gi bu gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
NK085(ru)007:2057: der rgyal pos bu lnga la khyed la rnams nus pa ci yod byas pas /
NK085(ru)007:2058: nyi ma'i bu na re sa la mi nub pa dang gnam la 'phur ba'i nus pa yod zer /
NK085(ru)007:2059: drag po yi bu na re /
NK085(ru)007:2060: srin po'i yul na phar la sprul nus zer /
NK085(ru)007:2061: lha'i bu na re rgyal po ngas lha ma yin 'byin nus zer /
NK085(ru)007:2062: rlung lha'i bu na re yo byad ci dang ci 'dod pa nga la mang po long zer /
NK085(ru)007:2063: khyab 'jug gi bu na re phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra' thams cad phung bar nus zer ro //
NK085(ru)007:2064: der bcung bskyabs seng gis pho bo dmag brgya' pa la skyon phab nas /
NK085(ru)007:2065: bu chung shos gnya' khri btsan po spyugs nas ma bsad skad /
NK085(ru)007:2066: bu gzhan thod ra nas bskus kyin bsad do //
NK085(ru)007:2067: des na ston pa 'di'i bstan pa yin yang zer /
NK085(ru)007:2068: yid kyi las gsum rnab sems gnod sems log lta'o //
